""" test of utils.make_tag """
assert utils.make_tag('a', {'href': 'foo'}, False) == '<a href="foo">'
assert utils.make_tag('a', [('href', 'foo'), ('href', 'bar')], True
    ) == '<a href="foo" href="bar" />'
with pytest.raises(Exception):
    utils.make_tag('a', ('href', 'foo'))
app = flask.Flask(__name__)
with app.test_request_context():
    proxy = utils.CallableValue('<hello>')
    assert utils.make_tag('a', {'href': proxy}) == '<a href="<hello>">'
escaped = flask.Markup('&')
assert utils.make_tag('a', {'href': escaped}) == '<a href="&">'
